file_content.text: You are all fools!
Everyone outside the temple will die shortly. It has to be this way.
This is for the good of the galaxy, I promise you.
You may have put an end to this plan, but so long as I have breath, I will have my vengeance!
It's time. HK! I have need of you!
Assurance: I will end all their pathetic lives, master!
Compliment: You died well!
Conclusion: My initial assessment proved true.
Caution: Damage levels approaching critical!
Alert: Systems in overload!
Observation: I have engaged in a minimum of twenty-three more strenuous conflicts.
Consolation: Your deaths will serve my master's ends!
Appreciation: Thank you for dying!
No! I won't be denied!
There's no one left to stop me. I'm coming for you, Vitiate.
You could have avoided this fate!
Your sacrifice will not be in vain.
I will never give in!
Your interference will be your undoing!
You cannot stop the sacrifice!
Not even close!
I will face the Emperor!
You would save this world only to destroy all of existence?!
Vengeance will be mine!
Think of how many lives the Emperor will consume!
My Revanites understand what you do not.
For the galaxy to survive, you must fall!
I am doing all that I can....
I only hope this will be enough....
Do not let him win.
He only thinks he is Revan.
I am with you. Be strong.
Brace yourself.
I can't believe you! It's madness that you would stop me from saving the galaxy!
The Force is with you.
He has even corrupted my friend.
Assessment: This collection of meatbags will not provide optimal killing satisfaction, master.
I trust you'll make do.
